name: Touch of Bloodletting
text: This spell causes any existing wounds that the target possesses to bleed profusely. If the creature’s current total hit points are less than its maximum, this spell causes the creature to take 1 point of bleed damage each round and become exhausted for the duration of the spell. A successful DC 15 Heal check or any spell that cures hit point damage negates the effects of this spell.
text_zh: 这个法术会使目标生物的伤口立刻开始无可抑制的大出血。如果目标当前的生命值低于他的生命值上限，你们该生物将每轮受到1点流血伤害并陷入力竭状态，直到法术的持续时间结束。通过一个DC15的医疗技能检定或任何能够恢复生命值伤害的法术都能终止此法术的效果。
